CmdLine: set -xe     && apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps git gcc musl-dev     && pip3 install --no-cache-dir python-socketio eventlet flask flask-cors     && git clone https://github.com/howmp/python-mysql-replication     && cd python-mysql-replication     && python setup.py install     && cd ..     && rm -rf python-mysql-replication     && apk del .build-deps
